name: Snail Puzzle
description:
Snail Puzzle is a puzzle game that player tries to solve the given color-based puzzle mission on his own deck. You need to complete every mission without timeout. With winning every single round, player rewards with extra time.Snail Puzzle is a puzzle game that player tries to solve the given color-based puzzle mission on his own deck. You need to complete every mission without timeout. With winning every single round, player rewards with extra time.

Controls:
To Move: Arrow Keys
Change Color Of The Tile Player Stands: Space
